DOC.brief_summary: The investigator evaluate effectiveness `` Living Everyday Above-and-beyond Pain '' ( LEAP ) program primary care set . LEAP multidisciplinary chronic pain group therapy develop two clinic site McMaster Family Health Team : McMaster Family Practice Stonechurch Family Health Centre . LEAP aim improve patients'quality life , interaction health care system health care utilization . This pilot study evaluate mainly feasibility . The investigator make use experimental qualitative method gather evidence program success , strengths weakness .
